main event: A group of witnesses observed a UFO with fluctuating lights in Toledo, Ohio on April 7, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first seen as one white light and two red ones,The object was in sight for about twenty minutes,Two other witnesses reported seeing a similar object on the same night,The lights were much brighter than the stars,Estimated speed of the object was well over 100 mph.
sighted object: UFO with one white light and two red lights
witness description: a group of individuals including teenagers and adults from Toledo
